title: The Community legit ruins the game if you are low elo
body: Pre game loby chat posted below, But people like this ruin the game

replies.body: At the part he said accident he banned my hover just to be a dick

[Summoner 1]:  can i mid plzzzz
[Summoner 1]:  :(((
Br0kenWings
[Summoner 2]
:  No
[Summoner 3]:  ban ilo please
[Summoner 1]:  wow big fuck you to you %%%%
Br0kenWings
[Summoner 2]
:  Really?
[Summoner 4]:  can i jg
[Summoner 1]:  yes
Br0kenWings
[Summoner 2]
:  I am a %%%% because I wont give you my role?
[Summoner 1]:  no u cant jgl* sorrrryyy
Br0kenWings
[Summoner 2]
:  Right
[Summoner 1]:  I WAS JGL LAST GAME AND CARRIED MY SHITTY TEAM
[Summoner 4]:  lmao

Br0kenWings
[Summoner 2]
:  Lol
Br0kenWings
[Summoner 2]
:  I can play more than [Champion]
[Summoner 1]:  oh no omg!

[Summoner 1]:  ^^

Br0kenWings
[Summoner 2]
:  For being abusive?
[Summoner 4]:  no
[Summoner 1]:  rather than just saying "NO"
[Summoner 1]:  then i wouldnt have reacted
Br0kenWings
[Summoner 2]
:  You asked a question
Br0kenWings
[Summoner 2]
:  I gave an answer
[Summoner 1]:  You said "NO!!!"
[Summoner 1]:  quoting you
Br0kenWings

Br0kenWings

___

Well your not wrong. Pretty much all medium/low elo gets crap like this.
